language.entry: 40% chance to interact with Fountain curios. Bad: Courtyard+/Cove.
35% chance to interact with Torture curios. Bad: Courtyard+/Ruins.
40% chance to interact with Torture curios. Bad: Courtyard+/Ruins.
20% chance to interact with ALL curios. Bad: Courtyard, everywhere.
20% chance to interact with ALL curios. Bad: Courtyard, everywhere.
27.5% chance to interact with ALL curios. Bad: Courtyard, Everywhere.
33% chance to interact with Food curios. Bad: Courtyard(+)/Warrens/Weald/Cove. Bring Blight/Disease Resist.
40% chance to interact with Drink curios. Bad: Courtyard+/Warrens+/Cove Bring Blight/Disease Resist.
40% chance to interact with Reflective curios. Steals items. Bad: Courtyard.
40% chance to interact with Unholy curios. Bad: Everywhere but Ruins.
40% chance to interact with Unholy curios. Bad: Everywhere but Ruins.
35% chance to interact with Worship curios. Bad: Warrens+/Ruins/Cove.
40% chance to interact with Worship curios. Bad: Warrens+/Ruins/Cove.
35% chance to interact with Worship curios. Bad: Warrens+/Ruins/Cove.
35% chance to interact with Treasure curios. Bad: Courtyard+/Everywhere.
35% chance to interact with Treasure curios. Steals items. Bad: Courtyard+/Everywhere.
40% chance to interact with Treasure curios. Bad: Courtyard+/Everywhere.
40% chance to interact with Body curios. Bad: Courtyard+/Warrens/Weald Bring Blight/Disease Resist.
40% chance to interact with Haunted curios. Bad: Ruins+/Courtyard+/Warrens/Weald.
40% chance to interact with Food curios. Bad: Courtyard+/Warrens+/Weald/Cove. Bring Blight/Disease Resist.
In town, will only Drink for stress relief.

In town, will only Gamble for stress relief. When Gambling, can win or lose trinkets. If this character would lose a trinket, they will lose one they have equipped otherwise it takes from stash. Give them bad trinkets to gamble with.
+11.4% chance to lose money and +13.3% chance to lose trinkets while Gambling.
+12.9% chance to win money and +13.3% chance to win trinkets while Gambling.
In town, will only Pray for stress relief.
In town, will only visit the Brothel for stress relief.
Is not allowed to visit the Brothel. For reasons best left to discretion.
In town, will only Meditate for stress relief.
Will not Pray or Flagellate for stress relief.
In town, will only Flagellate for stress relief.
Is not allowed to Gamble while in town.
Improved stress reduction while Meditating and while Camping.
May not Meditate while in town.
Will not Pray for stress relief.
15% Reduced damage for first round of combat.
10% Chance to turn any MISS into a HIT. Note it has to be a MISS not a DODGE. (a MISS occurs when enemies are stunned)
+20% stress received when Health is below 50%
No stress penalty when walking backwards.
The Great Pox...a sign of indiscretions.
Rejects pagan beliefs and many occult practices. Unused Quirk?
Intense fear of dead bodies. Unused Quirk?
Pays extra gold for all Abbey activities. Unused Quirk?
Life drains with each step... Unused Quirk?

RES: {colour_start|stun}200% Stun{colour_end} {colour_start|blight}200% Blight{colour_end} {colour_start|bleed}200% Bleed{colour_end} {colour_start|debuff}200% Debuff{colour_end} {colour_start|move}100% Move{colour_end} Ironwork. This 45% PROC boss only summons reinforcements. If a Matchman gets a turn, There's a 65% chance of catastrophic full party damage + {colour_start|stress}Stress{colour_end}.

This 2 Turn boss can Kidnap a random hero, dealing damage to them every turn. Attacking the Cauldron free's them. Expect full party damage, {colour_start|stress}Stress{colour_end}, and a 10% ACC 25% DMG Debuff.

This 8 speed boss summons a Unholy type enemy every turn, and always moves back a rank. Has a full party {colour_start|stress}Stress{colour_end} attack as well.

A Necromancer is performing unspeakable rituals in the shattered halls of your ancestral home. It must be stopped.
Deep within the shattered vaults of your ancestral home, a Necromancer is performing unspeakable rituals… even raising the dead! It must be stopped.

Attacks randomly, or Rank 1+2, Dealing x2 damage to marked heros. Ally Wilbur marks your heros. Attacking Wilbur causes boss to apply a {colour_start|stun}100% Stun{colour_end} on your entire party.

Attacks randomly, or Rank 1+2, Dealing x2 damage to marked heros. Ally Wilbur marks your heros. Attacking Wilbur causes boss to apply a {colour_start|stun}100% Stun{colour_end} on your entire party.
Extra: Bandages, Herbs, Shovels. Type: Eldritch. Effective: Blight, PROT Debuffs, Stun resist, PROT. Ineffective: Bleed. Danger: Debuff. A fish on two legs? Test the strength of this new menace.
Extra: Food, Herbs, Holy water, Keys. Type: Unholy. Effective: Blight. Ineffective: Bleed. Danger: Stress. Unholy abominations turning the Light against itself.
Extra: Bandages, Herbs. Type:Beast. Effective: Bleed, Scouting. Ineffective: Blight. Danger: Disease, Bleed, Stress. An exploratory sortie into a mad realm of tunnels.

Extra: Antivenom, Bandages, Herbs, Holy water, Shovels. Type: Eldritch/Human. Effective: Bleed, Debuff, Move. Ineffective: Blight. Danger: Bleed. Beat back these creatures that endanger traffic on the Old Road.

Extra: Bandages, Herbs, Shovels. Type: Eldritch. Effective: Blight, PROT Debuffs, Stun resist, PROT. Ineffective: Bleed. Danger: Debuff. Take the fight to the waters and show them our landward strength.
Extra: Food, Herbs, Holy water, Keys. Type: Unholy. Effective: Blight. Ineffective: Bleed. Danger: Stress. They can be killed. They can be beaten.
Extra: Bandages, Herbs. Type:Beast. Effective: Bleed, Scouting. Ineffective: Blight. Danger: Disease, Bleed, Stress. They can be killed. They can be beaten. Starting now.

Extra: Antivenom, Bandages, Herbs, Holy water, Shovels. Type: Eldritch/Human. Effective: Bleed, Debuff, Move. Ineffective: Blight. Danger: Bleed. Infection spreads unless checked. Put a tourniquet on the festering wood by destroying any creature you encounter.

Extra: Bandages, Herbs, Shovels. Type: Eldritch. Effective: Blight, PROT Debuffs, Stun resist, PROT. Ineffective: Bleed. Danger: Debuff. This aquatic cult respects nothing but force. Leave a trail of scales and gills and let them dwell on that.

Extra: Food, Herbs, Holy water, Keys. Type: Unholy. Effective: Blight. Ineffective: Bleed. Danger: Stress. There are times for strategy, and times for brute force. Send the undead back to the hells from which they were summoned. All of them.
Extra: Bandages, Herbs. Type:Beast. Effective: Bleed, Scouting. Ineffective: Blight. Danger: Disease, Bleed, Stress. The swinefolk are growing in strength and numbers. Cut them like diseased wheat.

Extra: Antivenom, Bandages, Herbs, Holy water, Shovels. Type: Eldritch/Human. Effective: Bleed, Debuff, Move. Ineffective: Blight. Danger: Bleed. Endless winding paths all arive at the same place: the enemy. Bring war to the Weald.

Extra: Bandages, Herbs, Shovels. Type: Eldritch. Effective: Blight, PROT Debuffs, Stun resist, PROT. Ineffective: Bleed. Danger: Debuff. Scout the unwholesome rocky formations beneath the Manor for signs of life.
Extra: Food, Herbs, Holy water, Keys. Type: Unholy. Effective: Blight, . Ineffective: Bleed. Danger: Stress. Test yourself in the mad realm of your fallen ancestor, but don't delve too far.

Extra: Bandages, Herbs. Type:Beast. Effective: Bleed, Scouting. Ineffective: Blight. Danger: Disease, Bleed, Stress. The beast-men spill forth from a thousand gaping holes. Pick one and search its extents.

Extra: Antivenom, Bandages, Herbs, Holy water, Shovels. Type: Eldritch/Human. Effective: Bleed, Debuff, Move. Ineffective: Blight. Danger: Bleed. Take the Old Road into the wood and then pick any of the dozens of dark paths.

Extra: Bandages, Herbs, Shovels. Type: Eldritch. Effective: Blight, PROT Debuffs, Stun resist, PROT. Ineffective: Bleed. Danger: Debuff. Plunge into forgotten grottos and assess the cancerous extent of the fishfolk's domain.

Extra: Food, Herbs, Holy water, Keys. Type: Unholy. Effective: Blight. Ineffective: Bleed. Danger: Stress. Unholy machinations have crushed together hallway and vault. Explore your ancestral home as far as you are able.

Extra: Bandages, Herbs. Type:Beast. Effective: Bleed, Scouting. Ineffective: Blight. Danger: Disease, Bleed, Stress. Explore the Warrens. With a better understanding of where the creatures are coming from, future raids can target their sources of power.

Extra: Antivenom, Bandages, Herbs, Holy water, Shovels. Type: Eldritch/Human. Effective: Bleed, Debuff, Move. Ineffective: Blight. Danger: Bleed. The Old Road is obscured by the corrupted, poisoned overgrowth. Explore it.

Extra: Bandages, Herbs, Shovels. Type: Eldritch. Effective: Blight, PROT Debuffs, Stun resist, PROT. Ineffective: Bleed. Danger: Debuff. Follow every cavern and grotto to its conclusion and discover from whence the malign currents flow.

Extra: Food, Herbs, Holy water, Keys. Type: Unholy. Effective: Blight. Ineffective: Bleed. Danger: Stress. Is an apocalypse building? Cinch your packs and delve far, far into the tunnels of your fallen family. Make a map of your expedition.

Extra: Bandages, Herbs. Type:Beast. Effective: Bleed, Scouting. Ineffective: Blight. Danger: Disease, Bleed, Stress. Gain entry to the network of tunnels and take them to every possible extent you can manage. Return with a complete map.

Extra: Antivenom, Bandages, Herbs, Holy water, Shovels. Type: Eldritch/Human. Effective: Bleed, Debuff, Move. Ineffective: Blight. Danger: Bleed. The Weald was nearly inscrutable even before the corruption. Provision well and mount an expedition.

Extra: Bandages, Herbs, Shovels. Type: Eldritch. Effective: Blight, PROT Debuffs, Stun resist, PROT. Ineffective: Bleed. Danger: Debuff. Your Ancestor was receiving eldritch relics via marine shipments. Find and return them to town safely out of the hands of greater evils.

Extra: Food, Herbs, Holy water, Keys. Type: Unholy. Effective: Blight. Ineffective: Bleed. Danger: Stress. When the Estate was overrun, so too were many treasures and symbols of the Light. The Abbot will pay dearly for such relics.

Extra: Bandages, Herbs. Type:Beast. Effective: Bleed, Scouting. Ineffective: Blight. Danger: Disease, Bleed, Stress. The swine's appetite for comestibles exceeds even their thirst for blood. Winter is always close, and the Hamlet would do well to restock its sparse larder.

Extra: Antivenom, Bandages, Herbs, Holy water, Shovels. Type: Eldritch/Human. Effective: Bleed, Debuff, Move. Ineffective: Blight. Danger: Bleed. A king's ransom of medicines was recently abandoned. They would greatly assist in rebuilding this sickly hamlet.

Extra: Bandages, Herbs, Shovels. Type: Eldritch. Effective: Blight, PROT Debuffs, Stun resist, PROT. Ineffective: Bleed. Danger: Debuff. The power of the fishfolk grows with every moon! Light the ancient wards, and drain some of the natural power that they draw upon.

Extra: Food, Herbs, Holy water, Keys. Type: Unholy. Effective: Blight. Ineffective: Bleed. Danger: Stress. The unholy abominations inhabiting the crumbling house have turned beacons of Light into vessels for diabolical worship. Cleanse these altars with Consecrated Essence.

Extra: Bandages, Herbs. Type:Beast. Effective: Bleed, Scouting. Ineffective: Blight. Danger: Disease, Bleed, Stress. The beast-men have erected crude shrines to their pagan Gods. Knock them down with pick-axe and impede their worship!

Extra: Antivenom, Bandages, Herbs, Holy water, Shovels. Type: Eldritch/Human. Effective: Bleed, Debuff, Move. Ineffective: Blight. Danger: Bleed. Blighted corpses lay strewn about the Old Road, teeming with filth and disease. Destroy this blight with Potent Salve.
Stunned by the apparent value of the thing concealed amidst its putrid feathers, onlookers wondered if a trek to its perch might not be in order...
The creature's power waxes terrible. Recover the protective relics from the long-abandoned base camp, but beware the Shuffling Horror.
The creature's gestation must be interrupted! Overwhelm the defending force and illuminate the beacons - force the Thing to reveal itself prematurely!
Your enemy is vast, sprawling, and must be destroyed from within. Slog through the twisting maze and find your way to its throbbing heart.
At last, the twisted heart of the world is laid bare – for sword, or supplication.
To arms! A Brigand raiding party is descending upon the Hamlet with explosive fury, and murderous intent!
It scours the land, picking up the trinkets left by dead heroes and hoarding them in its rotting nest.
It scours the land, picking up the trinkets left by dead heroes and hoarding them in its rotting nest.
It scours the land, picking up the trinkets left by dead heroes and hoarding them in its rotting nest.
Test yourself in the mad realm of your fallen ancestor. Take note of how the creatures have taken over, but don't delve too far.
Paranoid May move, refuse help in battle/camp, dmg ally, use skills.
Abusive Refuse move or camp skills, dmg ally.
Hopeless May move, refuse help, pass turn, dmg/mark self, use skills.
Fearful May move back, pass turn, refuse move/camp skill, interact w/ Worship curios.
Irrational May move, refuse help in battle/camp, interact w/ curios, dmg self/ally, mark self, use skills.
Masochistic May move fwd, dmg/mark self, refuse help in battle/camp, interact w/ Torture curios.
Selfish Move back, pass turn, use skills, refuse camp skill, steal from Treasure curios.
Use to cure {colour_start|blight}Blight{colour_end}. Curio interactions: Ruins: 0 Warrens: 0 Weald: 2 Cove: 1 Courtyard: 1
Use to stanch the flow of {colour_start|bleed}Bleeding{colour_end}. Curio Interactions: Ruins: 0 Warrens: 0 Weald: 2 Cove: 0 Courtyard: 1
Gives the Houndmaster a {colour_start|move}+50%DMG +15ACC Buff{colour_end} for 3 rounds. Curio interactions: Cove: 1
Use to camp. Make sure to have enough food for the meal phase or heroes will starve!
{colour_start|move}+33% Bleed, Blight, Disease, and Debuff resistance Buff{colour_end} for 3 turns. Curio Interactions: Ruins: 4 Warrens: 2 Weald: 2 Cove: 1 Courtyard: 2
A soothing tincture to inure one's mind against {colour_start|stress}Horror{colour_end}. More useful in the Later game, and the Courtyard.
Use to cure {colour_start|debuff}Debuffs{colour_end}. Curio Interactions: Ruins: 2 Warrens: 3 Weald: 1 Cove: 2 Courtyard: 1
Use to cross hazards and secure items.
Use to clear obstacles. Curio Interactions: Ruins: 2 Warrens: 0 Weald: 1 Cove: 2 Courtyard: 2
Use to unlock strongboxes. Curio Interactions: All: 2 Ruins: 2 Warrens: 0 Weald: 1 Cove: 0 Courtyard: 0 Farmstead: 1
Increases the light level. Curio Interactions: Ruins: 1 Warrens: 1 Weald: 0 Cove: 0 Courtyard: 2
Thralls will explode on round 2 of combat. Try to stun or kill them on round 2!!
BRIGHT LIGHT Mildly increased Stress Damage, Monster Attack, Loot, Player Crit
DIM LIGHT Increased Stress Damage, Monster Attack, Loot, Player Crit
SHADOWY Strongly increased Stress Damage, Monster Attack, Loot, Player Crit, Carrots
DARKNESS Greatly increased Stress Damage, Monster Attack, Loot, Player Crit, Potatoes

On hero's turn, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CLICK]{colour_end} a valid combat skill and then {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CLICK]{colour_end} a target to act. You can also use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[# keys]{colour_end} 1-5 to quickly select a skill.

Each skill has different requirements for where the hero needs to be standing and what enemies they can target. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[MOUSE OVER]{colour_end} the skill to se the requirements.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[MOUSE OVER]{colour_end} enemies to see stats and chances to hit/damage/crit with currently selected skill.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[RIGHT-CLICK]{colour_end} on Anti-Venom or Bandages in inventory to heal BLIGHT or BLEED on the current hero.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CLICK]{colour_end} on Retreat Flag to attempt to retreat from the combat.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[RIGHT-CLICK]{colour_end} on a hero to see their detailed character sheet.

Press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[D]{colour_end} to walk forward, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[A]{colour_end} to walk backward. When in front of a door, {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CLICK]{colour_end} on it or press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[W]{colour_end}.

Use {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[MOUSEWHEEL]{colour_end} to zoom map and {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[RIGHT-CLICK]{colour_end} and {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[DRAG]{colour_end} to pan map.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CLICK]{colour_end} on objects or press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[W]{colour_end} to interact with them. The selected hero will perform the interaction.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[RIGHT-CLICK]{colour_end} a hero or press {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[C]{colour_end} to see their detailed character sheet.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CLICK]{colour_end} on the retreat flag to abandon the quest.
When you would recieve a Gem, Shown below is your percent chance (out of 100) for each gem.

{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CLICK]{colour_end} on a room in the map to begin moving to that room. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CLICK]{colour_end} on a hero to select them.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CLICK]{colour_end} on a hero's move skill to change their party position.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CLICK]{colour_end} on firewood in inventory (if you have any) to start CAMPING and use camping skills.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[MOUSE OVER]{colour_end} the torch meter to see current light level and gameplay effects.
While interacting with an object: {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[RIGHT-CLICK]{colour_end} an inventory item to apply it to the object.
When you would recieve a Gem, Shown below is your percent chance (out of 100) for each gem.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[RIGHT-CLICK]{colour_end} on a hero in the roster to inspect their detailed character sheet. They can be renamed or dismissed permanently from there.
{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[CLICK]{colour_end} on buildings to use them to interact with your heroes.
BLACKSMITH: upgrade heroes' weapons and armor
SANITARIUM: treat heroes' quirks and diseases
A minor collectible, worth money in bunches. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Max stack: 10000]{colour_end}
Dull green like rotting flesh. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}[Max stack: 1875]{colour_end}
The shard of a wooden bench said to once hold followers of the Prophet!
